LanguageData.FirstSummerWarning:
Summer has begun! But winter is coming.

Your food crops won't grow in the winter cold. Be sure to store several months' worth of food now, while you still can.

You can build a walk-in refrigeration room to prevent food from spoiling.

And try to buy, steal, or make some parkas, or you'll freeze when you step outside.
LanguageData.RelationsBrokenDown: Relations with {0} have broken down. They are now hostile to you.
LanguageData.RelationsWarmed: Relations have with {0} have warmed. They are no longer hostile to you.
LanguageData.RelationsBrokenCapture: Because you captured {0}, {1} is now your enemy.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitRain: A {0} has short-circuited in the rain and started a fire.
LanguageData.AreaRevealed: A new area has been revealed.
LanguageData.AreaRevealedWithMechanoids: A new area has been revealed. It contains ancient, hostile mechanoids.
LanguageData.RoofCollapsed: A roof has collapsed because it was too far from any support.
LanguageData.BirthdayChronological:
It's {0}'s chronological birthday today! Biologically, {1} is {3} years old.

Chronologically, {1} just turned {2}.

Note that since people don't age while in cryptosleep, chronological birthday is separate from biological birthday.
LanguageData.NewDisease: {0} has gotten sick from {1}.\n\nEnsure you have a medical bed and a doctor. Make sure that {0} gets proper treatment and spends as much time in bed as possible.
LanguageData.NewPartDisease: {0} has developed an infection in HIS {1}.\n\nEnsure you have a medical bed and a doctor. Make sure that {0} gets proper treatment and spends as much time in bed as possible.
LanguageData.AncientShrineWarning: As {0} draws near the ancient structure, a sense of foreboding overcomes HIM. HECAP isn't sure why, but HE feels that this dusty structure may contain great danger.

LetterLeaderChanged: {0} is no longer {3} of {1}.\n\nThe new {3} is {2}.
LetterCaravanEnteredEnemyBase: {0} has arrived at {1} and is ready to begin the attack.
AnimalManhunterFromTaming: A {0} is attacking due to a taming attempt!
LetterRelatedPawnsNeutralGroup: There are people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners in the arriving group:
LetterDefeatAllEnemiesQuestCompleted: You have defeated the enemy outpost!\n\nThe payment from {0} has arrived, and faction relations have improved by {1}.
LetterRejectedProposal: {1} has rejected {0}'s marriage proposal. {0} is going to be unhappy about this.
LetterNewlyAddicted: {0} has developed an addiction to {1}.\n\nHECAP now has a need for {1}, visible on HIS Needs tab. HECAP will automatically consume the drug to fulfil HIS need. If HE cannot get any {1}, HE will go into withdrawal.
LetterNewParty: {0} is throwing a party! Everyone who goes will gain joy and social energy, and a lasting positive mood boost.
LetterNoLongerLovers: {0} and {1} are no longer in a relationship.
LetterCaravanEnteredEnemyBaseBecameHosti: {0} has arrived at {1} and is ready to begin the attack.\n\nBecause of your hostile approach, {2} is now hostile to you.
LetterRelatedPawnsTradingWithSettlement: The settlement is selling people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners:
RelationshipAppendedLetterTextPrisoner: NAME has a relationship with one of your prisoners. HECAP is {0}'s {1}.
LetterFactionBaseDefeated: The enemy outpost {0} has been destroyed.\n\nYou have {1} to collect items before your colonists reform the caravan.
LetterBondedAnimalDiedMulti: {0} has died. It will affect mood of the following people:\n\n{1}
LetterFoundPreciousLump: Your long-range mineral scanner has found a lump of precious resources nearby.\n\nWe don't know who or what - if anything - might be guarding it.
LetterRelatedPawnsTradingWithOtherCarava: The caravan is selling people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners:
LetterRelatedPawnsTradeShip: The orbital trader is selling people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners:
LetterNewLovers: {0} and {1} have come together and are now lovers.
LetterFriendlyTrapSprung: {0} has accidentally sprung a trap and taken damage from it.
LetterFactionBaseDefeated_FactionDestroy: This was the last base of {0}, which means the faction does not exist anymore.
LetterNamedBondedAnimalDied: {0} named {1}, bonded to {2}, has died. It will affect {2}'s mood.
LetterAcceptedProposal: {1} has accepted {0}'s marriage proposal.\n\nAt some point in the coming days or seasons, they will have their marriage ceremony and invite all the colonists. Consider placing a marriage spot if you want to control where the ceremony occurs.
LetterAllCaravanColonistsDied: All members of your caravan have died.
LetterFormedCaravan: Your caravan has formed and awaits orders on the world map.
LetterCaravanEnteredAmbushMap: {0} has arrived at the ambush site.
LetterPawnsLostDueToMapCountdown: Some of your animals or prisoners were left behind in the wilderness:\n\n{0}
RelationshipAppendedLetterTextColonist: NAME has a relationship with a colonist. HECAP is {0}'s {1}.
LetterRelatedPawnsRaidFriendly: There are people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners in the arriving group of friendly {0}:
LetterBondedAnimalDied: {0}, bonded to {1}, has died. It will affect {1}'s mood.
AnimalManhunterFromDamage: A {0} is attacking after being harmed!
LetterNamedBondedAnimalDiedMulti: {0} named {1} has died. It will affect mood of the following people:\n\n{2}
AnimalManhunterOthers: Other {0}s nearby have also become enraged!
LetterAffair: {0}, married to {1}, has begun an affair with {2}.
LetterRelatedPawnsRaidEnemy:
There are people who have relationships with your colonists or prisoners in the arriving group of {0}.

Keep in mind that even though they are related, they will still attack each other because of their bad factions relations.

These people are:
